Get Salaries

Source: R/get_salaries.R
get_salaries.Rd

wrapper around get_salary() for multiple years

Usage

get_salaries(
  years = 2008:2021,
  union_rate = "tv-l",
  area = "west",
  resolution = "monthly",
  dbg = TRUE
)

Arguments

years

years of tariffs to try to download (default: 2008:2021)

union_rate

default: "tv-l"

area

default: "west"

resolution

"monthly": Monatswerte, "annual": Jahreswerte, "quarterly": Quartalswerte, "weekly": Wochenwerte, "weekdays": werktagswerte, "daily": Tageswerte. Default: "monthly"

dbg

print debug messages (default: TRUE)

Value

tibble with salaries for multiple years

Examples

salaries <- get_salaries(years = 2008:2021)
#> Getting 'monthly' salary table for 'tv-l' ('west') for year 2008 ... ok. (1.15s) 
#> Getting 'monthly' salary table for 'tv-l' ('west') for year 2009 ... ok. (1.02s)
